name: The Beam Centre Table by Kelly Hoppen - Davidson
description: Discover the Beam Centre Table, a creation born from the collaborative genius of Kelly Hoppen for DAVIDSON. This luxury console table stands as a striking testament to modern sophistication, where taupe ash legs provide a graceful foundation for a sleek black lacquered top. The legs, inspired by Kelly Hoppen's signature taupe, add a touch of warmth and elegance to the design. The high gloss lacquered tabletop, measuring 900mm in diameter, exudes a refined polish, creating a focal point that captures the eye. Designed to be a versatile centrepiece, the Beam Centre Table is equally at home in a grand entrance hall or as a small dining table. Its contrasting lacquer top and veneer legs add a layer of visual interest and sophistication to the design. Supported by four tapered legs, the table stands as a testament to meticulous craftsmanship and thoughtful design. Elevate your interior with this exceptional piece, a result of the collaboration between Kelly Hoppen and DAVIDSON. This console table transcends the ordinary, becoming a statement of style, sophistication, and luxury. It not only reflects Kelly Hoppen's renowned design sensibilities but also showcases DAVIDSON's commitment to crafting exquisite pieces that stand the test of time.
